about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-BT03/SP01 Vairina Exspecta
- D-BT03/SP02 Howitzer of Dust Storm, Dustin
- D-BT03/SP03 Avaricious Demonic Dragon, Greedon
- D-BT03/SP04 Diabolos Returner, Deryck
- D-BT03/SP05 Gravidia Nordlinger
- D-BT03/SP06 Cardinal Draco, Destijade
- D-BT03/SP07 Heavenly Shock of Distinction, Lagrele
- D-BT03/SP08 Magic of Objective, Kakarone
- D-BT03/SP09 Flagship Dragon, Flagburg Dragon
- D-BT03/SP10 Shadowcloak
- D-BT03/SP11 Stealth Dragon, Fushimachi Madoka
- D-BT03/SP12 Blaze Maiden, Ximena
- D-BT03/SP13 Dragritter, Shihab
- D-BT03/SP14 Steam Mage, Ashur-da
- D-BT03/SP15 Diabolos Madonna, Regina
- D-BT03/SP16 Desire Devil, Incane
- D-BT03/SP17 Aurora Battle Princess, Execute Lemonun
- D-BT03/SP18 Gravidia Stanner
- D-BT03/SP19 Aurora Battle Princess, Tra Bouquenvillea
- D-BT03/SP20 Easerod Angel
- D-BT03/SP21 Heavenly Incitation Above the Clouds, Blagar
- D-BT03/SP22 Magic of Revelation, Totris
- D-BT03/SP23 Aggress Blue Dragon
- D-BT03/SP24 Sylvan Horned Beast, Gabregg
- D-BT03/SP25 Sylvan Horned Beast, Enbarr
- D-BT03/SP26 Desire Devil, Boshokku
- D-BT03/SP27 Gravidia Barringer
- D-BT03/SP28 Ascendance Assault
- D-BT03/SP29 Desire Devil, Gouman
- D-BT03/SP30 Desire Devil, Taida
- D-BT03/SP31 Gravidia Wells
- D-BT03/SP32 Gravidia Dellen
- D-BT03/SP33 Neatness Meteor Shower
- D-BT03/SP34 Inroad Shooter
- D-BT03/SP35 Officer Cadet, Charicles
- D-BT03/SP36 Burning Flail Dragon
- D-BT03/SP37 Stem Deviate Dragon
- D-BT03/SP38 Patrol Robo, Dekarcop
- D-BT03/SP39 Blade Feather Dragon
- D-BT03/SP40 Aspiring Maiden, Alana

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
